data:
| Risk | Classification | Mitigation Plan | | --- | --- | --- | | Negative public opinion on the use of AI | High | - Increase transparency on AI usage and algorithms.
- Provide options for non-AI assisted learning.
- Conduct regular audits and reviews to ensure ethical AI usage. | | Energy consumption | Medium | - Use energy-efficient servers and cloud services.
- Implement power management features in the platform.
- Encourage users to use power-saving settings. | | Dependence on AI model providers | Medium | - Diversify AI model providers.
- Regularly evaluate and switch to better providers.
- Develop in-house AI models as backup. | | Unfriendly interfaces | Medium | - Conduct regular usability testing.
- Implement user feedback mechanisms.
- Regularly update UI/UX design to improve user experience. | | Lack of feedback | Low | - Implement feedback mechanisms in the platform.
- Encourage users to provide feedback.
- Regularly review and address user feedback. | | Poor prioritization of functionalities | Low | - Conduct regular prioritization reviews.
- Implement user feedback mechanisms.
- Regularly update product roadmap based on feedback. | | Low visibility on social media | Low | - Implement social media marketing strategies.
- Encourage users to share their achievements on social media.
- Regularly update social media channels with relevant content. | | Difficulty in measuring training quality | Medium | - Implement learning analytics and metrics.
- Provide learning outcome reports to users.
- Regularly evaluate and improve measurement methods. | | AI use regulations | High | - Regularly review and comply with AI use regulations.
- Implement privacy and security features in the platform.
- Conduct regular audits and reviews to ensure compliance. | The mitigation plans for the risks identified are designed to minimize their impact on the product and ensure a safe and effective learning experience for users. Regular reviews and updates to the mitigation plans will be necessary to ensure their continued effectiveness.
